lead_paragraph: CUNNINGHAM--Bill. The Trustees, Fellows, and staff of the Morgan Library & Museum commemorate the life and work of the singular Bill Cunningham. He was a true and valued friend to New York's cultural community and will be greatly missed. Lawrence R. Ricciardi, Pres. Colin B. Bailey, Dir. 1/3
